txt.en: Your eye is drawn west across the map, beyond the borders of Rohan, and comes to rest upon the cruel circle of Isengard. You wonder what has become of Lothrandir within the prisons of Saruman.
Your mind wanders as you contemplate the fate of Lothrandir in his captivity.
As you study the contours of Gléowine's map, your mind is drawn to wonder what has befallen Lothrandir in the prisons of Orthanc.
Study Gléowine's map and complete 'Interlude: Strength of Will'
Your mind travels far as you study the map, musing on the fate of Lothrandir, still a captive of Saruman.
